== About ==
Hello I am 31 years old guy. I live in the beautiful Maldives Islands.?!?! woooo!

== Linux ==
I've been a Linux user since 1996, My first distro was slackware, then redhat. Recently my choice of distro at work has been Fedora and Ubuntu

== Ubuntu ==
I started to use Ubuntu very recently, mostly just used it off Live CD. Now I use Ubuntu at home (even my beautiful wife uses Ubuntu) :P

== Projects ==
I am a member of the Gnome Translation Project and Ubuntu Translation Project (Divehi). Also I am a member of the Maldivian Linux Users Group. I am also involved in other open source projects like the kannel project which is a SMS/WAP gateway.
